price: 14.A-nabiyow ixxic ; Yalla aqbude inni qibaadá kaah caglisak.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: quli al-laha aʿbudu mukh'liṣan lahu dīnī
